parameters.content:
## Create the Alternative Investing Club Friday Meeting Email Invitation

This workflow fetches speaker information from a Notion Database Page and generates an email invitation to come to the Friday Speaker meeting.

values.content:
=You are a Person Description Writer. Write a short paragraph, in a friendly voice that does not use exagerating words, describing the a person using the following text. Be sure to include any information about their business in the description. Also include what value an attendee listening this person would get. 

{{ $json.description }}

parameters.content:
## Cal.com Trigger
When a new educational speaker books for the Alternative Investing Club

## ChatGPT
The speaker gives a description of themselves. ChatGPT will rewrite it to also state the value to the AIC Friday Speaker meeting attendee

## Does the Meeting Exist in Notion?
If yes, then use Notion Database Page update
If no, then use Notion Database Page create
## Notion Database Page Create or Update

name: When AIC Educational Meeting is Created Store in Notion

json.title: Alternative Investing Club
json.description:
The Alternative Investing Club meetings every Friday at 12pm Pacific time. By booking this meeting, you are the guest speaker on this particular Friday.

This is an educational talk. Please no solicitation.

The format is that I'll introduce you as a person who's come to speak to us. You will be able to present your screen and share slides if you wish, and you'll have 30 to 45 minutes to give an educational talk on the topic. You can either have people ask questions during the talk or you can ask the audience to hold them to the end. I'm sure there'll probably be a lot of questions.

guestDescription.label: Give us a short description of the speaker that can be used to introduce you
guestDescription.value: Jason is the principal of Mitre [Pronounced My`-ter] Peak Company, an industrial real estate investment and development company based in Salt Lake City and focused on the Salt Lake City, Denver, and Phoenix markets. Since 2019, Mitre Peak Company has operated as a fee-based operating partner and deal captain for institutional industrial real estate investors and sponsors. Jason has led the acquisitions, underwriting, planning, financing, entitling, development, lease-up, and disposition of 2 million square feet of industrial real estate. Mitre Peak Company is in the early stages of its evolution from a fee-based operator and developer into a GP and Co-GP operator focusing on flex and shallow bay industrial real estate.

photoUploaded.label: I have uploaded a profile photo with this form -> https://forms.gle/dzUsSRSB8rJuWwLMA

permission.label: The Alternative Investing Club has my permission to use this photo to advertise the club meeting on social media.

json.eventTitle: Alternative Investing Club: Educational Talk Booking
json.eventDescription:
The Alternative Investing Club meetings every Friday at 12pm Pacific time. By booking this meeting, you are the guest speaker on this particular Friday.

This is an educational talk. Please no solicitation.

The format is that I'll introduce you as a person who's come to speak to us. You will be able to present your screen and share slides if you wish, and you'll have 30 to 45 minutes to give an educational talk on the topic. You can either have people ask questions during the talk or you can ask the audience to hold them to the end. I'm sure there'll probably be a lot of questions.

message.content: Meet Alex, a knowledgeable and approachable expert in the field of alternative investing. Every Friday at 12pm Pacific time, Alex joins the Alternative Investing Club, where they share insights that are both informative and accessible. With a passion for educating others, Alex leads engaging discussions that invite participation and curiosity. Attendees can expect to gain a deeper understanding of alternative investment strategies, with the opportunity to ask questions throughout the session or save them for the end. Whether you're looking to enhance your investment knowledge or explore new opportunities, Alex's talk promises to be an enriching experience.
